ygData.subject: Re: Looking for a spell table...
ygData.msgSnippet: http://gameznet.com/eq/spells/wizard.html  this is very comprehensive but does not list the mana requirements etc you request... it is, however, the most
ygData.messageBody:
http://gameznet.com/eq/spells/wizard.html this is very comprehensive but
does not list the mana requirements etc you request... it is, however, the
most complete list I have found

http://eq.stratics.com/spells_wiz.shtml this goes up to level 29 with the
things you require in your post below..

http://www.dubuque.net/~sirkal/LibFrames.htm




-----Original Message-----
From: James Guintu <james@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 4:19 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Looking for a spell table...


>From: "James Guintu" <james@...>
>
>I'm looking for a web page which lists the complete wizard spells including
>spell effects, mana cost and if an offensive spell, the damage it does. I
>am a level 21 Erudite wiz(Euros) playing on Rallos Zek. From what I
gather,
>the level 24 wizard DD spell Frost Shock does around 200 dmg for 110 mana.
>If this is the case, it sounds to me like this is the level where we
>wizard's start to mature. That damage/mana ratio is very, very good.
>Nearly as good as DOT's. Can any higher level Wizzies out there confirm
>this? Also the 20th level spell Force Shock does great damage yet is
>resisted too often by "dangerous" blues and higher mobs to be my exclusive
>high damage spell. Does this trend of high resistance continue as we get
to
>higher levels? Or is Force Shock some kind of special case?
>
>Thanks,
>
>Euros
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>What do lizards and rock music have in common?
>http://www.onelist.com
>They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!
